# Database Authentication

## Generated by

```bash
spring init -dweb,security,thymeleaf,lombok --build maven -g com.company -a bookapi c10-db-auth
```

## Add dependencies

```xml
    <dependency>
        <groupId>nz.net.ultraq.thymeleaf</groupId>
        <artifactId>thymeleaf-layout-dialect</artifactId>
    </dependency>
```
